subject: Rajasthan History
question_en: What is the significance of the Meera Temple in Bikaner?
question_hi: बिकानेर के मीरा मंदिर का पत्रकारी क्या है?
explanation_en:
The Meera Temple in Bikaner holds historical significance as it represents the cultural and architectural heritage of the former princely state of Jaisalmer, which is now part of Rajasthan.

बिकानेर मीर मंदिर, सामर्थ्य और भविष्यात्मनिक अनुभव और भविष्यात्मनिक अनुभव
explanation_hi: बिकानेर मीर मंदिर, सामर्थ्य और भविष्यात्मनिक अनुभव और भविष्यात्मनिक अनुभव
explanation_en:
The Meera Temple in Bikaner represents the historical and cultural heritage of the city and the former kingdom of Jaisalmer, which is now part of Rajasthan.

बिकानेर मीर मंदिर, समाजवात्मनिक अनुभव
